item.title: Data Visualization: Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Food Consumption
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I created a data visualization of the top 15 countries with the highest total annual carbon dioxide emissions from food consumption using highly customized aesthetics in R.

item.title: Text and Sentiment Analysis: Songs from Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings: The Album
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I explored songs from the *Shang-Chi* album by looking at word frequencies and conducted sentiment analysis using AFINN and NRC lexicons.

item.title: Time Series Analysis: Willamette Falls Fish Ladder Passage
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I used time series analysis to explore and visualize various rates (daily, monthly, annual) of fish passage at the Willamette Falls Fish Ladder, Oregon for three different species of salmon.

item.title: Spatial Analysis: California Oil Spills
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I plotted spatial maps to visualize California oil spills by county and conducted point pattern analysis to investiate locations of spatial clusters of oil spills.

item.title: Principal Component Analysis: USDA Food Nutrient Information
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I used principal component analysis to explore macronutrient and micronutrient information for various food groups listed by the United States Department of Agriculture.

item.title: Logistic Regression: Classifying Florida Palmetto Species
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I explored Florida palmetto data through exploratory visualizations and used binary logistic regression to classify palmetto species.

item.title: Hypothesis Testing: Different Watersheds on Sugar Maple Mass Growth
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I investigated differences in sugar maple stem dry mass from treatment and control watersheds in 2003.

item.title: Data Visualization: Mono Lake Elevation Levels from 1850-2017
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I created a data visualization of Mono Lake elevation levels and its major historical events using highly customized aesthetics in R.

item.title: Linear Regression: Juvenile Snowshoe Hares at Bonanza Creek
item.dc:creator: Shuying Yu
item.description: In this project, I created an exploratory report for the relationship between body weight and hind foot length in juvenile female and male snowshoe hares using linear regression analysis.
